page.title: 06 Recreation
page.content: After school I went on a cycle ride to the old air base, situated near {Staunton.}I reached the bumpy muddy track which leads towards the abandoned air base. I decided to explore. Some rooms had the bones of trapped animals which had died. Other rooms are just derelict. After exploring I decided to go home. During the weekend I play on my computer. At 8.10am I go to{Grantham to do my Gold swimming award with my brother. I do some shopping and come back. I feed my finger devouring rabbit. My brother and I set off on a bike ride to {Staunton in the Vale.}We come back over the bridge over the A1 and return down Vicarage Lane. I sometimes have a three course Sunday lunch at the Manor Hotel in{Long {Bennington. } {CONT'D ON PAGE 7
